message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product! It's valued at $1,500,000 and I'm confident it will be a great asset to you.  I'm willing to let it go for $1,700,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $1,600,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
